subject: Steroids
Baseball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Guillermo  Mota was suspended Wednesday for the first 50 games of the 2007 season for violating Major League Baseball’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Guillermo  Mota was suspended Wednesday for the first 50 games of the 2007 season for violating Major League Baseball’s policy on performance-enhancing drugs.
